website_summaries.verdict: Ready-to-use silicone earplugs already molded for swimmers, surfers, children, and adults.
pros: 3-flange shape creates a customized-like individual fit
Also works well for sleeping to drown out sound
cons: Not good for those who have larger ear canals
Too small, and could get lost easily

customer_reviews.title: They Look a Bit Weird but BOY Do They Keep the Water Out!
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the moldable silicone type of ear plugs for swimming I was a bit skeptical that the unusual design of these ear plugs would effectively keep the water out of my ears. Not only did they work...it turns out they are far superior. In addition to being more comfortable than the silicone plugs they are also completely washable and the package came with two sizes for optimum fit. 10/10 will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Rashie

customer_reviews.title: Wear them every night to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at first to use when I went into my pool but after running out of regular plugs for sleeping, I used these and I have never looked back! These drown out sound so much better than the foam ones and are very comfortable and easy to clean. I am sold on these as my every night ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: QueenRobyn

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functioning earplugs for swimming...
customer_reviews.text: This set of swimming earplugs fit nice and snug while remaining comfortable for use when doing daily swimming exercise. There are 2 sets of earplugs that come in a container for easy on-the-go storage in a gym bag without getting lost. I like these pre-molded silicone earplugs over the puddy style types that can be molded to fit in the ear since I can tell these are still fitted in place while swimming. This is a nice addition to help prevent swimmer's ear when in the pool daily.
customer_reviews.author: MarilynTop Contributor: Firefly (TV Show)

customer_reviews.title: Always keep on hand.
customer_reviews.text: We keep these handy. My daughter has had ear surgery and is not allowed to get any water in her ear. This is the only type of earplugs that have worked for us. They are soft and don't hurt when you put them in and also keep a good seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: i'm pleased. they can be inserted dry
customer_reviews.text: i've used these several times and they work just the way intended. i'm pleased. they can be inserted dry, but wetting them a little before you insert them helps ease the way - only thing you should be careful of is not to insert them too fast or extract them too fast as you could create excess pressure or suction in the ear canal that way. i've been careful to insert and extract slowly and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought because I still have tubes in my ear as well lost my other earplugs while back which are Mack earplugs too. What I like about these earplugs they're flexible to fit most ear hole sizes without worrying about rubbing too rough on the ear hole skin which I had experience with other earplugs that were made out of a flexible hard plastic that hurts putting them in and out. The only thing to worry about is not to yank them out that I learn from experience as well I didn't read the instructions which cause discomfort or ear damage. So to avoid any ear damage you have to twist first then lightly pull them out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Game&Grump

customer_reviews.title: plug it up chris, im about to, plug it up chris, cause thats what i was born to do!
customer_reviews.text: these are great! have their own carry case, totally plug out water! i love them! i have small ears and ear canals, as in i cant wear ear buds of any kind (that i have tried so far) and these work great for swimming laps. they block out all the water... and all the sound. there is mumbling and if my swim buddy is right next to me, i can kind of hear her... hopefully there wont be any emergencies at the gym! either way, its better than pesky water in my ears...
customer_reviews.author: Kat Facepunch

customer_reviews.title: Great plugs for swimming!
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad ears since childhood, too much water in and they'll get infected. These are the first plugs I've had that I feel pretty confident going underwater with. Have had these in on wake-board falls (wasn't going too fast because I'm not very good though) and snorkeling in breaking waves, with no issues. Your ears will still get moisture in, but much less than with wax plugs in my experience. Short of custom molded plugs these are probably as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: These earplugs work to keep water out and noise out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earplugs to keep water out of my ears while swimming. They work great for that! They are easy to put in and take out, and they are very comfortable. The online reviews said they were also good for noise. I recently stayed overnight at a place where loud trains go right by all night. I used these earplugs, and I did not hear a single train all night. I thought no trains had passed that night, but my friends who stayed at the same place told me they had all been awakened by several trains during the night. I am very happy with these earplugs!
customer_reviews.author: SPerkins

customer_reviews.title: They work well but don't last all that long
customer_reviews.text: I use these for lap swimming and they have been pretty solid. I'm a 6' male and they fit my ears well. I have had them fall out a couple of times, but I think it's because I did not have them in securely. I would give them 5 stars, but they don't seem to last all that long. Nevertheless, if you are looking to keep water out of your ears while swimming, these will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: FL Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Useless for bigger ear canals and lap swimming
customer_reviews.text: In case you have bigger than average ear canals and you'd like to use those for swimming, do not waste your time and money. Your ears will be full of water in a few minutes and you'll have to remove the earplugs in order to empty the water. Also the specific seller I purchased from does not offer returns (!), i.e. I will digest my loss of a little more than $5 for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve recently taken up swimming for fitness and found that I was getting swimmer’s ear. Never dealt with it before when I went to the pool for fun but swimming laps did me in. These plugs work perfectly and thankfully don’t have that annoying string some other plugs I tried had. My swim cap fits over my ears so I never worry about losing them. The case comes in handy, especially for also holding my earrings I take out before swimming. Plugs in, earrings out. And then swap when done.
customer_reviews.author: LadyT530

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Water Ear Plugs with a Nice Case!
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable Water Ear Plugs with a Nice Case! These keep your ear canals dry for bathing (head dunking style) and swimming The MACKS brand go in and come out without any pain...unlike the cheaper ones out there that are harder material and feel like a plastic bolt was crammed in there. lol And the transparent color is a good and bad thing...good if you're swimming and don't want to bring attention to the earplugs...taking a bath, well, don't drop them in the water as they are harder to find without a pigment. If these hold up a couple of years or more this will be my brand and model for life!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a daughter who gets swimmer ear infections. They did not stay in her ear at all. Even with a macks earband on to cover her ears. We ended up using the silicone earplugs to work and even those were ify,. Another child (16 yo) got water in her ear, so we experimented with the other pair in the box...they did not prevent water seepage either. Thought we put them in wrong, but no matter how we inserted and twisted, the water still found it's way in the ear and they didn't really stay put either. Really disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Homeward bound

customer_reviews.title: ULTIMATE QUIET
customer_reviews.text: I got these because we were taking a bike ride to the SW and my bike has straight pipes. Ear plugs are a must. But my husband is a world champion snorer. At home we have our own rooms. Before I had bought snore blocker ear plugs and they were worthless. I would actually get my own room about every 3rd night. Now I have to look no further. These things work great. They don't hurt my ears. They are easy to insert. So by day, I wear them riding my motorcycle and by night, I sleep quietly. These things are really good
customer_reviews.author: MZ MARY

customer_reviews.title: Work perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended on another product page by an Amazon customer and I'm so glad I heeded his or her advice. These earplugs work very, very well. I haven't had any water leakage whatsoever. At first they were not completely comfortable, but I pulled them out just a bit and that made them much more comfortable. Do follow the directions - the method they describe works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: owsinsomnia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have ear problems (tube in one eardrum and prone to infections), so I absolutely cannot get water in my ears. However, I love to swim and have a lap pool in my backyard, so I need really good protection. These fit the bill amazingly well. Easy to place and they STAY in place for 20, 30 laps and more with no problem and NO water in my ears. Life savers. These are the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rick R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: The best fit!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived swiftly. This type of earplugs fit the best inside my ears and don't slip out when swimming laps. I warm it in my hands, stick in my ears and swim! The Clear silicone that's supposed to form snugly in the ear canal to block water simply doesn't work for me. I constantly have to work it in. Very annoying! Perhaps it's because I have small narrow ear canal. But these I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kg Spaz

customer_reviews.title: For your ears only?
customer_reviews.text: Found these difficult to install - my ear channels are on the small side. Occasionally one will fall out - fortunately I swim in an Endless Pool so recovering an ear plug isn’t too difficult. It’s easy to imagine a better design that would accommodate different ears, or at least better if the company didn’t assume that “one size fits all”.
customer_reviews.author: A. Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Finally ones that seal!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a bunch, this is the first batch that actually seals your ear and lets no water through. Be gentle putting them in and taking them out or your ears will pop, and they do cancel out almost all sound so be prepared for that. I get ear infections in the pool and have not had one since I got these. Plus they seem to hold their shape and integrity well.
customer_reviews.author: fbunda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly. Keeps water out, are not too invasive, fairly comfortable (as comfortable as earplugs can be) and they work! Did I say they work? They come with a little case, which is great to keep them from getting covered in bag lint or getting misplaced. Easy to put in & remove. If you suffer from swimmers ear, this is a worth while investment.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable earplugs
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable earplugs I have used. I work with a lot of tools and am constantly trying to find quality earplugs to save my hearing from all the noise. These do the trick. They are extremely soft and malleable so I can adjust them easily to fit my ear properly. I was a little skeptical when I pulled them out of the box and they were so soft. However, upon using them I found them to be comfortable and sound deafening. I've tried many ear plugs over the years but these are the ones Id recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E cash

customer_reviews.title: Plugs stay in, water stays out.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I use them for kayaking roll practice in a swimming pool and they do an excellent job of keeping the water out of my ears and they also seem to stay in better than any others I've used so far. You get two pair in case you lose some and yeah, you really can't hear much with them in, but I'd say it's worth it to keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: At home in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Utterly Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a Sep 2018 Cruise for swimming and snorkeling. They are awesome. They seal well in my ear and prevent water from getting in and they are very comfortable. They did not fall out and were easy to remove when I wanted to remove them. Just purchased a second order of these to keep for future water adventures. I tried another brand that was twice the price and not near as good as these. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckieP

customer_reviews.title: Best Earplugs Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots and lots of different earplugs and this one works way better than all the others. Soft silicone that conforms to my ear canal, which must be oddly shaped since so many other earplugs don't work. I primarily bought it for swimming but have also used it when I need to block noise and that works well also.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years, and I've never had an issue. They're soft and easy to fit into my small ear canals, and do a great job at blocking out water. They could be easy to lose if you're not careful, but the provided case helps with that. I've tried some different earplugs over the years, but keep going back to Mack's.
customer_reviews.author: Euan Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. Tks!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Tks! I am a beginner swimming. It makes more comfortable. I bought it before my first lessons because I saw the reviews. Actually all of it was a coincidence because I live in the country and in a very urban area. In fhe urban, I like to use these kind of plugs to reduce the noise when I want total silence to sleep. My previous got too old and where very similar to these. I got very happy to find similar to my old ones and use them also in the water in my clsses to ne scheduled at the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for keeping water out of ears
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my grandma was getting vertigo from water getting in her ear when I would help her shower. Now we start the shower with these and water stays out. They stay in the ear canal better than any other plugs I've used for her. Since using them she no longer complains about hearing water slosh around in her ears, so this is a major win. We had tried the wax ones you put over ears and those are an absolute nightmare. These work so much better and are so simple!
customer_reviews.author: Firefly303

customer_reviews.title: Blocks water and noise - probably equivalent to 29 Decibels.
customer_reviews.text: Mack's perform just as well as Speedos in terms of keeping the water out and blocking noise. You do have to kind of shove them into the ear canal to get them to block water and noise. They're probably equivalent to 29 Decibels soft foam ear plugs (maybe even higher). I will buy these over the soft foam, because I can just wash them (whereas I had to throw out the soft foams, making them less environmentally friendly).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great in and out of the water
customer_reviews.text: I bought these originally for swimming and they are awesome. They fit perfectly and keep the water out. They worked so well swimming, that I bought another set for sleeping. They block the noise better than the foam ones that are supposed to mold to your ear.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming
customer_reviews.text: My ears tend to get a lot of water stuck in them when I swim, so earplugs are a necessity for me. These work very well to keep the water out of my ears, are comfortable, and fit well under my swim cap. They're also easy to insert, remove, and clean. The case they come in is perfect to keep in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: SwimBikeWalkGirl

customer_reviews.title: These ear plugs are amazing! After using various kinds of other ear plugs ...
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are amazing! After using various kinds of other ear plugs to go swimming and then trying these... these work perfectly! They block out the water soon as I get in and I don't have to worry about coming up as often or having my ears irritated (which is common every time I go in the water) I live in Miami and I tried these while in the beach and I actually felt like a mermaid. The salt water wasn't irritating and my ears and my head felt clearer. I gave a pair to my boyfriend as well and he loves them. He always wants to go swimming now. Honestly thankful I went ahead and ordered these
customer_reviews.author: shanel

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and got jammed on first try and couldnt remove
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not purchase these. I had these for a while now but never used them because I bought another pair from speedo. I lost my speedo ones and tried these. The rubber is super flimsy and on first try of getting it in my ear, it got jammed and I almost had to go to the hospital to get it surgically removed. Thankfully we were able to pry them out with tweezers. As someone with hearing issues and a history of water getting in their ears I have tried many products similar to these but never experienced any issues until trying these. These are not worth damaging your ears. Buy the speedo product instead for the few bucks extra.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Boland

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found these!
customer_reviews.text: I used these recently on a snorkeling trip in the Indian Ocean. I was honestly hesitant because I had swimmer's ear as a kid, and only ever found ear plugs to be painful. These kept the water out, they didn't hurt, and I barely noticed them. I am so happy I found these, and I will recommend them to anyone who asks!
customer_reviews.author: Poco Drago

customer_reviews.title: Better than others I have tried
customer_reviews.text: Using exclusively to keep water out and they do the job. They can be a little difficult to insert properly. Pulling the ear up and forward helps. Removing requires some finesse. They seat firmly when inserted properly. Overall, though, pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Mack's for 5 years now and never had any issues.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I buy Mack's. They are really good earplugs. There are some people out there who state: when I take shower water still gets into my ears! It is probably you don't know how to safely put them in your ears. So, It has been 5 years since I started using this earplugs, I never had any issues of water getting into my ears. I only use them for a shower, not for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Mesopotamian

customer_reviews.title: Great for swimming...
customer_reviews.text: Great earplugs for swimming, seal is excellent. The posts are a tiny bit on the short side or my ear canals are long, ha! In order to remove, I have to spend a second or two carefully massaging to find the post but not an issue. The little case is fantastic, thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: AppleFan

customer_reviews.title: I love to swim
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with ear infections. I love to swim, so I was so happy that my brother recommended these. They work perfectly. At first look, I took pause because of their shape. However, they are surprisingly comfortable. They also locked out all water and kept my inner ears completely dry. Very pleased, indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Do a good job
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I go surfing. They’re very easy to put in/remove and very comfortable. I didn’t want too much noise cancellation so I can hear the waves which is good. They do a good job of keeping water out even in Big surf. They’re also easy to clean and fit well in the box it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: GA

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These work. I swim laps, they keep out the water. They don't hurt as they are a soft plastic. Take out gently to avoid possible ear drum damage, due to the popping that can occur if you don't twist them out sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: juan ovakyn

customer_reviews.title: They fit but crawl back out more than I'd like.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I recently had tubes put in my ears and was told not to get any water in my ears. I pretty much use them any time my head might get wet (shower and swimming). They do fit well and you have to push them in as far as you can to get them to stay. Even with that they do crawl back out and in the short time I am showering I have to push them back in several times as I feel they are coming out. They serve their purpose for me but an avid swimmer may not want to be adjusting them often.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend getting a darker color because these could be difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: The earplugs fit my ears perfectly. Other earplugs with similar shape have always hurt my ears and had to be removed after a few minutes. These do not hurt at all and block all water from getting in the ear. I am not sure if they have darker colors or not, if so, I would recommend getting a darker color because these could be difficult to see if you drop them in water.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: there is nothing worse than getting blindsided by a wave and having full ...
customer_reviews.text: 8/11/2017 Mack's Aqua Block Ear Plugs We just bought a new boat, and I was so excited Mack's AquaBlock Earplugs. Being the ocean, there is nothing worse than getting blindsided by a wave and having full ear water all day. I have tried three other types, and thus far these are my favorite. If they are a little too long, you can stip off the end. I love these because they have a "screw tip" like head and fit perfectly in my ears. I recommend these for ocean lovers, but would they would great for the pool, water sports, etc. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fallucca

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found Yet
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable earplugs I've ever used, and I've used a lot. They are completely soft through the entire design which I like. The problem with the traditional hard center type is that they become painful after wearing for prolonged periods. You won't have that issue with these. I'm an audio engineer and use these for hearing protection. I must warn you they block a tremendous amount of sound and may be too much for some. I like that aspect and would estimate somewhere between -25dB to -30dB reduction on ALL frequencies. I went ahead and ordered more to give to friends and have some backups.
customer_reviews.author: NastyPaul

customer_reviews.title: I get swimmer's ear very easily (since childhood)
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a product I can wear in my ears during swimming!! I've tried putties and other plugs, but no luck. I get swimmer's ear very easily (since childhood), and my ears are tiny, and so I've needed to try a ton of products. The other products were too big, or didn't shape well, or would slip, and I'd still get water in my ears. This product fits in my ears well, doesn't slide, and I can do all strokes in the water without getting any water in my ears. I'm so happy I eventually found these!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C. G.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect on my left ear
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect on my left ear, but my right ear (the one I have problems with) would not seal tightly . I think its my ear, not the plug. It did help keep water out of the problem ear, but not as well as the left ear. Would work fine on anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of the popular earplugs on the market and these work best. They are easy in and out, stop all water without being too tight. And for the price, wow. And they have no wear after using them 3 times a week for a year or more.
customer_reviews.author: rmerritt

customer_reviews.title: The answer to a more sound sleep.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that they get suck on my ears even to the point that they need to be removed with tweezers, these are the best earplugs I have found. They reduce noise more than 50% allowing me to get better sleep. They are very comfortable and completely washable. Keep a spare set for the camper. I like the storage box that is included with them also. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clickety-Split

customer_reviews.title: great for being in a noisy pool area
customer_reviews.text: work well for keeping water out of ears when swimming, also they block 95% of all sound, great for being in a noisy pool area..Must be careful removing them as the plugs create a vacuum and could damage an ear drum if you are not very carefull removing them. Just go slowly and wiggle the plug from side to side.
customer_reviews.author: joelrides

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and keeps water out - everything you need
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs are super comfortable and light! It feels like they conform to your ear. You can feel the suction that the earplug creates, which is what keeps the water out. I liked that I could still hear my music while I was wearing them in the shower. Other observations: The end part has a grippy texture that makes it easy to pull the earplug out, & they come in a little reusable case.
customer_reviews.author: Avery Davis

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain for Preventing Ear Infections
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other types of earplugs that sometimes work ... sometimes don't. These, though, have an innovative design and form a "seal" so water doesn't enter your ear canal. (Once you have a painful ear infection after swimming, you will always want to use these!) I am actually using these in the shower. I used to have to shake my head from side to side to get the water out and never felt like that was a total success. They fit perfectly and are easy to insert and remove. The directions on the package are very thorough, so you know just how to use them. I love that they are #1 doctor recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: They are incredibly useful! If you put them in right, they will keep water out to an extent, remember, they're less than 10 bucks, and with very little irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good! My husband snores and I work nights, so believe me I need my sleep they drown out the noise. I've bought them several times once they start wearing down. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying these, comfortable and work really well.
customer_reviews.text: I did my research before buying these. I’m glad I did. These are awesome! I definitely recommend buying them. I needed earplugs because I keep getting ear infections from the water. I knew I needed something comfortable as well as something that really worked to keep the water out of my ears . These were it :-)
customer_reviews.author: francesca

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These actually seem to be working. I am experiencing less swimmer's ear issues since I started using them. I recommend wetting them prior to putting them in the ear- improves the way they go in and how well they keep water out.
customer_reviews.author: prints phil

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay in
customer_reviews.text: They simply won't stay in my ears. One dive into the water - and I am just talking about a dive while standing in the pool - and the earplugs come out.
customer_reviews.author: M.S. - Fort Myers

customer_reviews.title: Use them for swimming.
customer_reviews.text: These work very well for me when swimming. Other ear plugs hurt my ears. These are so soft and work so well. Lost mine a few years ago and was so happy to find another set here!
customer_reviews.author: B. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: better than the mushy wax kind
customer_reviews.text: These fit my ears well and kept out most of the water. I used to go to the doctor for a fitted earplug, and am glad that these are so easy to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emkin

customer_reviews.title: Protect your ears!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate earplug for swimming and snorkeling. Just make sure they are wet before you insert them into your ear. And get a color that's easy to spot when you drop them, because you will.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hillard

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter to use in the pool. They work well but sometimes water did get in her ears. While they are not fully water proof, and she did try multiple ways of inserting them, she definitely preferred to use them than not .
customer_reviews.author: K. Taylor-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great ear plugs for swimming AND sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I swim almost everyday and wear these earplugs which provide a very good seal in the ear to keep water out. I also discovered they make great noise blocking ear plugs.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: The worst! Didn't remotely keep the water out during shower
customer_reviews.text: The worst! Didn't remotely keep the water out during shower. The only ones to buy are the waxy moldable ones!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy K

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for swimming. They've revolutionized swimming for me! No more residual water in my ears for 24 hrs after swimming! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Novice swimmer - but these made a HUGE difference
customer_reviews.text: First - I'm using these for the comfort of not having water slosh in my ears while swimming for exercise not prevention of ear infection. I've never had an ear infection and have practically dumped oceans of water in my ears ... so I have no idea how they perform in this department. I swim in open water and these do the job and are VERY comfortable. I'm pretty amazed how comfy they are. They seem to block water very well, but if you take them out and reinsert them, keeping the water out will be very difficult (although it won't be much that gets in). The stay in place very well. I haven't lost one yet.
customer_reviews.author: CesiumSalami

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I picked these up for the pool. Always had problems with water in my ears but never tried plugs before. These stayed in for the hour or so I was in the pool and kept my ears dry. They sound about the same as any foam earplug, lets enough noise in that you can still talk and hear things around you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done
customer_reviews.text: They work very well for me and do exactly what I need them to do. The only time these earplugs have come out of my ears while swimming were when I have done some higher intensity butterfly sets, but they've stayed in my ears pretty well even when I do those sets. So they hold up extremely well in practice, but they may not hold up well during competition. With all of that being said, they overall get the job done! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Better than most option, but some water still goes in my ears
customer_reviews.text: This is a late review as I bought these in 2016. I have used it to swim and to shower, and have found that some water does sip in my ear no matter how well I put it. It seals better than other options, but my experience is that it still lets some water in.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra G.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. I recently started swimming and kept getting water in my ears. I decided to get some plugs so I could stop the problem. I came across these purple babies and have been working excellent. If you are wondering how they feel, they feel like earbud earphones in your ear. I have not had any water since. Great buy.,
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best Earplugs I've ever had for swimming
customer_reviews.text: These earplugs keep me from getting water into my ears, time after time. MUCH more effective than the moldable plugs I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Geves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for swimming of all kinds.
customer_reviews.text: I use these ear plugs for open water swimming in a moderate current and they work great! Easy to insert into the ears, soft and comfortable fit that keeps all water out. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Brown

customer_reviews.title: worked as marketed
customer_reviews.text: The two pack are purple in color and come in a nice plastic case. The plugs work as advertised for my ears. It makes swimming chlorine pool free style laps more comfortable and less worried about ear infections.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bobowiec

customer_reviews.title: Fell Out and Lost Forever on First Use
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, these are totally not worth it! They fell out of my ears and disappeared forever the very first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to stop getting water in ears in the shower. Nope! Did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to yell for help to my wife for tweezers, just about got the left side out.
customer_reviews.text: They create a strange vacuum, sucked in my ear. I had to yell for help to my wife for tweezers, just about got the left side out. I have never been so scared. I will stick to cotton from now on. I think my ear canal is to big, plus this rubber is to soft.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny. It states that they’re recommended for ages 7 and up, but no way do these work for me. My ears aren’t huge or anything. Maybe my ear canals are big? I don’t know, but they should come in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Winnick

customer_reviews.title: Short stem, can get lodged deep into ear canal.
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs have a short stem and they got stuck in my ear and I had a hard time pulling them out. Other than that they are just ok and I had a little water get in my ear. Everyone's ears are different so I recommend buying at least two different ear plugs to find one that fits you. I also ordered the Speedo Ergo Ear Plugs, Silver color, and they fit me better than these ones. Good luck and happy swimming.
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Well designed for many years of reliable service
customer_reviews.text: These work very well either for swimming or noise abatement in the home. The product does not indicate if it is OSHA compliant for use in the workplace so, for such applications, I would recommend looking for products labeled as such. But for swimming, and other underwater activities, these do the job well and can last many years with proper maintenance (i.e. washing them with warm water regularly).
customer_reviews.author: Christian M. Kartanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These ear plugs are much better than previous ones I tried. Water does not get in my ear and they do reduce the noise level.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Attn: Swimmers; sleepers; & relaxation! BEST Earplugs by Mack's Aquabuds currently on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied I came across this product. As a recreational swimmer, I have tested many earplug products and nothing has compared/come even close to Mack's AquaBlock Earplugs. The fit very well and do not fall out. Other earplugs have caused infections due to coming loose and not being as tight as needed. I have purchased a few pairs for different activities; i.e., swimming, sleep, and loud places. I also have a few pair on back up when needed. I mostly use this product for swimming and sleep. I have been recommending these exceptional earplugs to many family and friends. You can't beat the price to give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Kiser

customer_reviews.title: Best Ear Plugs!
customer_reviews.text: My son needs ear plugs for swimming and these work the best! I have tried other kids but end up going back to these every time!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear in the pool
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear in the pool I’ve tried the other ones where you mold them to your ear very uncomfortable and we get stuck in your hair these fit right into your ear I would definitely recommend them over others
customer_reviews.author: suz3175

customer_reviews.title: Not products fault
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me, had an ear infection and eventually went totally deaf... NOT the products fault
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Plugs will not stay in
customer_reviews.text: Won’t stay in my adult ear when showering and water gets in my ear. I used to use plugs made of vinyl and it stays put and no water gets in my ear but it’s no longer made.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Best plugs I've found
customer_reviews.text: Comfy (most aren't) and they stay in place and, most importantly, they keep the water OUT of my ears! Of course, they impede my hearing a little bit but I just take them out when I'm not going to be underwater for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: I initially jumped in the pool without my earplugs and as soon as I started to get that water in the ear sensation remembered I had them. Easy to utilize and they did exactly what they were supposed to do. Having the immediate prior experience of not using them provided the opportunity for comparing the with and without swimming experience. Hands down, the way to swim! N.B. One can still hear what's going on around you, which is a positive especially when ones swims in a public pool as I do!
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great ear plugs!
customer_reviews.text: as a triathlete swimming is my least favorite of the three sports. I’ve always felt uncomfortable in the water and after I get out. These made a huge difference and my ears never bother me after the pool now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and effective
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered a similar product ( Cindick)which was twice the price as this product, it was totally ineffective and subsequently returned. When I received this alternative product I was very pleasantly surprised, It worked as advertised and I am completely satisfied with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: George Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great earplugs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent earplugs, I have bought them 3 times already (lost the previous pairs) and I have no regrets whatsoever. They fit my ears really well and I the end of practice they are completely dry. The material is soft so it doesn't hurt. They are just a bit tricky to remove, but it will get easy with some practice. They will change their colour with continuous use though so you will want to wash them if you want to avoid it. They will turn yellowish within some months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul SanchezTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: ... listening to Fourth of July fireworks they do not disappoint him to walking the noise and the water
customer_reviews.text: This product works excellently underwater in a shower or just walking down the street when you are listening to Fourth of July fireworks they do not disappoint him to walking the noise and the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: These DO NOT keep water out of your ears! I got these to keep water out of my ears since I have tubes in them. The very first time I used them, I ended up getting water in my ear and an ear infection! Totally useless!
customer_reviews.author: Rasool Farzanmehr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for a few years now. I find they actually keep water out and it doesn't totally stop you from hearing.
customer_reviews.author: WhoDat2553

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for Swimming Laps
customer_reviews.text: I could not swim laps without these! They are the ONLY kind of ear plugs that will stay in, in the water, and they are small and comfortable. I always get water in my ears just swimming freestyle from turning my head, and these save the day. I just wish they were a bit firmer like the ones I had before. :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just recently found these and bought them. I swim 2-3 times per week about one mile each day and I cannot survive without ear plugs! The other type I used were stiff and hurt my ears as I used them. I have had these ear plugs for just over 2 weeks and I realize that may not be enough time to yet say with assurity but I really like these plugs! They are comfortable in my ears and are soft yet keep the water out and not irritating to the tender part of my ear!!! Hopefully they will not stiffen up with time but I will watch for that but as of now I like them alot!
customer_reviews.author: James B. Barton

customer_reviews.title: I didn't understand at first how these were supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand at first how these were supposed to work. They didn't arrive with any instructions on how to insert them. Then I got some Mack's Ear Seals at the supermarket and was saved by those instructions. Here's what helped: you reach over your head and pull up and back on your opposite ear to straighten the ear canal before inserting the plug with a circular motion. Once I did that, I was able to sense the vacuum effect that makes them airtight. I haven't been in the water with them yet, but I have much more confidence in them now than before. I hope this information will help others who are new to using these!
customer_reviews.author: Deb P

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! My ears are a little sensitive and I always get water in my ears when I dive but this solved the problem. They come with a little case that helps you not lose them but I still managed to lose a pair. These are way better then the runner ones you can form and put into your ears. Those hurt while going in
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Chan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and better than not wearing anything at all
customer_reviews.text: I used my clear ones for the first time last night. Though the right ear did not seal 100%, it was better than having the entire pool flowing through my canal. I'm not going to give-up on them, as I believe I could have placed them in better (read the directions on the back). People have had great success with them, and you likely will too. I'll report back if they seal 100% on my next swim, or if they do not. (side note: I grew-up using the wax balls from the local pharmacy, and never had issues with them)
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Adult sized. They work. Shipped fast.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. Adult sized. Water in my ears has been a problem for me for years. I finally decided to stop being so obtuse and use ear plugs when I swim. These work. I am VERY happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Born & raised  in Iowa, can't get used to the weather.

customer_reviews.title: Fit well in my ears and work great.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I have recently started getting swimmers ear. A lot. It's painful and annoying. So, I put these in before swimming and bathing and they have been working very well. I'm very impressed. I have a daith piercing in both ears and these fit my ears great. No more swimmers ear. I would recommend these and I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Alethaskid

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my ears. They were too small ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my ears. They were too small to block water or any sound. Loose in the ear canal. I have average sized ear canals.(I wear the middle size inserts you get with many earbuds) They may work for smaller ear canals. I did not see a size choice when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: MSF

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Weird product. I bought these to use when in the shower. They are hard to form and water still got into my ears causing me to get dizzy in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

product_meta.title: Mack's AquaBlock Swimming Earplugs - Comfortable, Waterproof, Reusable Silicone Ear Plugs for Swimming, Snorkeling, Showering, Surfing and Bathing
feature_bullets: #1 BRAND FOR PREVENTING EAR INFECTIONS - Mack’s is the #1 Doctor Recommended Brand to help prevent swimmer’s ear infections. Also helps prevent Surfer’s Ear. Mack’s are so trusted, they are the Official Earplugs of USA Swimming!
EXTREME COMFORT - Pre-molded, flanged earplugs made with SuperSeal Ultra Soft Silicone, providing ultimate comfort for extended wear
EASY TO USE WATER PROTECTION - Unique Flex Stem and triple flange design allow for a more customized fit, increasing sealing ability, effectiveness and comfort
HIGH QUALITY - Long lasting, durable silicone will not deteriorate like similar earplugs made of plastic. Washable, reusable and latex free.
DURABLE STORAGE CASE for on-the-go convenience. Mack’s AquaBlock keeps the water out! Satisfaction guaranteed.
